Posts.Content:
Hello Everyone, 
I wanted to post this, as all the information I found on my own, online, about
 Core Needle Biopsy's were horrendous! Anxiously, I visited the Breast Care Center today and had the biopsy preformed. The hardest part is not knowing what to expect. 
As someone that hates needles, Honestly, I didn't even feel the numbing agent go into the tissue. When they took three samples with the core needle, all I could feel was a pressure, but nothing painful. There were two people in the room assisting- 
If you are about
 to have a Core Biopsy, don't fret- it's a piece of cake! 
Best of luck to you!
Posts.Title: Painless Biopsy! There is hope, don't fear!
